fields.description:
Off the Grid's FIRST Friday night dinner market in the South Bay and fourth Friday night market overall, Off  the  Grid:  San  Carlos  @  Devil’s  Canyon  Brewery  will  offer  a  welcome destination dinner option for Highway 101 commuters Devil’s Canyon Brewery will open to the public from 4 - 9 p.m. with food service starting at 5 p.m. and live music indoors from 6 – 8 p.m. 

The new market creates a vibrant, unique and convenient community event to enjoy with family and friends. Trucks this evening include:
Lexie's Frozen Custard
Hula Truck (1)
3 Brothers Kitchen
Porky's SJ
The Steamin' Burger
Judie's Tacos Locos
fields.name: Off the Grid: San Carlos @ Devil's Canyon Brewery (Friday Dinner)
